entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:14PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 614 PM MDT, conditions are becoming favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes in and around the northeast portion of Yuma County.
